original_text: And his concubine was unfaithful to him, and she went away from him to her father's house at Bethlehem in Judah, and was there some four months.
korean_text: 그 첩이 행음하고 남편을 떠나 유다 베들레헴 그의 아버지의 집에 돌아가서 거기서 넉 달 동안을 지내매

sentences.original_text: And his concubine was unfaithful to him
and she went away from him
to her father's house at Bethlehem in Judah
sentences.korean_translation: 유다 베들레헤에 있는 아버지 집으로 갔으며

sentences.original_text: and was there some four months
